Package ParticleEngine.caches

Class LightCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticleEngine.caches.LightCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParticleRunner
    public class LightCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParticleRunner
    The LightCache class is used to create faster caches based on particle engines. HeavyCaches use images, and take a long time to produce. Light caches take less time to produce, but may run somewhat slower than heavy caches depending on complexity. For particle effects with more than 200 particles, one should probably use a heavy cache. Otherwise, a light cache will probably be more efficient.
    See Also:
    ParticleEngine, HeavyCache
